topic.title: Domestic Account managing tasks: FT03.01
topic.shortdesc: Account is a banking product. Bank provides to its clients accounts in local and foreign currency. Clients manage all account tasks within specially designed Account UI page within clients Workspace.

body.p: Bank and its client usually sign contract and required currency account is opened. Client gets internet banking application. As client login to application, clients Workspace web page is opened were client reach specially designed Account UI page. To handle specific account task client have to select the task and its UI page is opened. Account managing tasks are:
